meanings.definition: A covered entrance to a building.
meanings.sent1: The porches of the houses in our neighborhood are all different.
meanings.sent2: We sat on the porch and watched the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The porches were so small, even the cat had trouble fitting on them.
meanings.sent4: The porch of the old house creaked like a haunted ship.
meanings.sent5: The porch shielded us from the rain as we waited for the bus.

meanings.definition: A veranda or balcony attached to a house.
meanings.sent1: The porches on the beach houses had stunning ocean views.
meanings.sent2: We enjoyed breakfast on the porch every morning.
meanings.sent3: The porches were perfect for sunbathing in the afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The porch felt like a private oasis amidst the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The porch was a peaceful retreat from the chaos of daily life.

meanings.definition: A platform with a roof supported by columns, at the entrance of a building.
meanings.sent1: The grand porches of the mansion welcomed guests with elegance.
meanings.sent2: The porch of the courthouse was adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The porches were the perfect spot for the town's gossip sessions.
meanings.sent4: The porch stood tall and proud like a guardian of the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The porch provided a regal entrance to the historic building.
